div.p: This page provides a list of the FHIR artifacts defined as part of this implementation guide.

{% capture grouping_desc %}The following artifacts define the specific capabilities that different types of systems are expected to have in order to comply with this implementation guide. Systems conforming to this implementation guide are expected to declare conformance to one or more of the following capability statements.{% endcapture %} {{ grouping_desc | markdownify}}

tr.td: {% capture desc %}This is a CapabilityStatement that defines the expected capabilities of the Data Receiver actor as a Server.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}This is a CapabilityStatement that defines the expected capabilities of the Data Source actor.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}This is a CapabilityStatement that defines the expected capabilities of the Data Submitter actor.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

td.a: Uds Plus Trust Service Provider CapabilityStatement

tr.td: {% capture desc %}This is a CapabilityStatement that defines the expected capabilities of the Trust Service Provider actor.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

div.p: {% capture grouping_desc %}These are custom operations that can be supported by and/or invoked by systems conforming to this implementation guide.{% endcapture %} {{ grouping_desc | markdownify}}

tr.td: {% capture desc %}Generates de-identified data from identifiable data. The de-identification algorithm to be used is left to the implementers of the operation. Errors during the execution of the operation can be returned as OperationOutcome per the FHIR spec as a return parameter.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}Notification from a Health Center about the availability of the data to HRSA using Bulk Import mechanism.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

div.p: {% capture grouping_desc %}These define constraints on FHIR resources for systems conforming to this implementation guide.{% endcapture %} {{ grouping_desc | markdownify}}

tr.td: {% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile is based on the AdverseEvent resource and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing Allergies and Intolerances for UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile is based on the AllergyIntolerance resource and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing Allergies and Intolerances for UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

td.a: De-Identified UDS Plus Clinical Result Observation

tr.td: {% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile is based on the Observation resource and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing clinical result observations for UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile is based on the Condition resource and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing Diagnosis for UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile is based on the Encounter resource and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing encounters,visit information for UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile is based on the Immunization resource and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing immunizations for UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile is based on the Observation resource and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing Income ranges for UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile is based on the Observation resource and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing lab observations for UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile is based on the MedicationRequest resource and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing MedicationRequest for UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile is based on the MedicationStatement resource and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing MedicationStatement for UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile is based on the Observation resource and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing assessments, vitals and other social history observations for UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}This Patient profile represents a Patient availing HRSA services.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile is based on the Procedure resource and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing procedures for UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}This Patient profile represents a RelatedPerson of a Patient availing HRSA services.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile is based on the ServiceRequest resource and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing ServiceRequest for UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile is based on the **US Core Sexual Orientation Observation profile and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing Sexual Orientation for UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing Coverage for UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

td.a: UDS Plus DeIdentify Data Urls Parameter

tr.td: {% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile is based on the **Parameters FHIR Resource and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing the data for sending input and receiving output for the DeIdentify operation of UDS+ .{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile is based on the **Parameters FHIR Resource and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing the Manifest for UDS+ import FHIR Operations.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}Indicates the location where the care was provided{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}The UDS+ profile is based on the **Parameters FHIR Resource and establishes the core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets for representing the Patients and if they are counted for the various reports.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

div.p: {% capture grouping_desc %}These define constraints on FHIR data types for systems conforming to this implementation guide.{% endcapture %} {{ grouping_desc | markdownify}}

tr.td: {% capture desc %}Indicates the age of the patient at a specific time{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

td.a: UDS Plus Agriculture Worker Status Extension

tr.td: {% capture desc %}Indicates the agriculture worker status of the patient at a specific time{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}Indicates the birth sex of the patient{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

td.a: UDS Plus Capitated Member Months Extension

tr.td: {% capture desc %}Indicates the number of capitated member months of the patient for the reporting year{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}Indicates the ethnicity of the patient.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

td.a: UDS Plus FeeForService Member Months Extension

tr.td: {% capture desc %}Indicates the number of FeeForService member months of the patient for the reporting year{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}Indicates the gender identity of the patient at a specific time{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}Indicates the housing status of the patient at a specific time{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}Indicates the race of the patient.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}Indicates the recorded date of a clinical event{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}Indicates the Veteran status of the patient.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

div.p: {% capture grouping_desc %}These define sets of codes used by systems conforming to this implementation guide.{% endcapture %} {{ grouping_desc | markdownify}}

td.a: Uds Plus Agriculture Worker Status Codes

tr.td: {% capture desc %}The Uds Plus Agriculture Worker Status Codes is a 'starter set' of codes for specifying agriculture worker status for Patients.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}The Uds Plus Birth Sex Codes is a set of codes for identifying the birth sex of Patients.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}The Uds Plus Gender Identity Codes is a 'starter set' of codes for identifying the gender identity of Patients.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}The Uds Plus Housing Status Codes is a 'starter set' of codes for identifying the Patient's housing status.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}The Uds Plus Insurance Codes is a 'starter set' of codes for identifying the source of the insurance for Patients.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}The UDS Plus CodeSystem is an 'addition set' of one code to the existing Location Service Delivery Codes value set for UDS+ purposes.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}The Uds Plus Sexual Orientation Codes is a 'starter set' of codes for identifying the sexual orientation of Patients.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

div.p: {% capture grouping_desc %}These define new code systems used by systems conforming to this implementation guide.{% endcapture %} {{ grouping_desc | markdownify}}

td.a: UDS Plus Agriculter Worker Status Codes

tr.td: {% capture desc %}The UDS Plus CodeSystem is a 'starter set' of codes supported for identifying agriculture worker status for UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

td.a: UDS Plus Housing Service Delivery Codes

tr.td: {% capture desc %}The UDS Plus CodeSystem is an 'addition set' of one code to the existing Location Service Delivery Codes value set for UDS+ purposes.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}The UDS Plus CodeSystem is a 'starter set' of codes supported for identifying Housing status of patients in UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}The UDS Plus CodeSystem is a 'starter set' of codes supported for identifying insurance types used by patients in UDS+ program.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

div.p: {% capture grouping_desc %}These are example instances that show what data produced and consumed by systems conforming with this implementation guide might look like.{% endcapture %} {{ grouping_desc | markdownify}}

td.a: Example of a Manifest file used for multiple operations in the context of HRSA UDS+ FHIR IG

tr.td: {% capture desc %}An Example of a conformant UDS+ Parameters resource representing a manifest file used by the $import and the $de-identify operation.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}An Example of a conformant UDS Plus AdverseEvent resource with de-identified information.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}An Example of a conformant UDS Plus AllergyIntolerance resource with de-identified information.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}An Example of a conformant UDS Plus ClincialResult resource profile with de-identified information.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

td.a: UDS Plus Parameters Example for $deidentify operation

{% capture desc %}An Example of a conformant UDS Plus Related Person resource with de-identified information.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}An Example of a conformant UDS Plus Reporting Parameters resource with de-identifeid information.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}An Example of a conformant US Core Condition resource with identifiable information capturing a Problem List Item.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}An Example of a conformant US Core Encounter resource with identifiable information capturing a visit.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}An Example of a conformant US Core Healthcare Organization resource with identifiable information.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}An Example of a conformant US Core Location resource with identifiable information.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

tr.td: {% capture desc %}An Example of a conformant US Core Organization resource for a Payor entity.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}An Example of a conformant US Core Patient resource with identifiable information.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}An Example of a conformant UDS+ Condition resource with de-identified information capturing a Problem List Item.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}An Example of a conformant UDS+ Encounter resource with de-identified information capturing the visit information.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
